head.citation-title: "Solvent-less" mechanochemical approach to the synthesis of pyrimidine derivatives
head.abstracts: © 2017 American Chemical Society.Modified ZnO NPs were synthesized through a sol-gel route with an aromatic capping agent to provide a highly efficient catalyst, NS-5, for the one-pot multicomponent synthesis of various pyrimidine derivatives using a solvent-free ball milling technique. Greenness of the present method was evaluated by calculating an Ecoscale score and E-factor. Characteristics of the method include use of a recyclable catalyst, scale-up to a multigram scale, and ease of product isolation.

copyright.$: Copyright 2017 Elsevier B.V., All rights reserved.

coredata.dc:description: Modified ZnO NPs were synthesized through a sol-gel route with an aromatic capping agent to provide a highly efficient catalyst, NS-5, for the one-pot multicomponent synthesis of various pyrimidine derivatives using a solvent-free ball milling technique. Greenness of the present method was evaluated by calculating an Ecoscale score and E-factor. Characteristics of the method include use of a recyclable catalyst, scale-up to a multigram scale, and ease of product isolation.
coredata.dc:title: "Solvent-less" mechanochemical approach to the synthesis of pyrimidine derivatives

subject-area.$: Renewable Energy, Sustainability and the Environment
